text: Creative Campaigning is an accessory for the 2nd edition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game, published in 1993. ==Contents== Creative Campaigning is aimed at providing Dungeon Masters with fresh ideas for running their Dungeons & Dragons campaigns. It includes chapters outlining novel campaign settings, adventure ideas and new ways of using existing game materials. ==Publication history== ==Reception== ==Reviews== *White Wolf #38 ==References== Category:1993 books Category:Dungeons & Dragons sourcebooks
title: Creative Campaigning
